main event: On November 4th, 1959 in Baghdad, Iraq, a military source reported a visual UFO sighting. The object was described as a small, bright white oval that approached rapidly and disintegrated into red fragments after 3-5 seconds. The observer suggested it was probably a meteor.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a military source and described as a visual observation.
The object was a small bright white oval that disintegrated into red fragments after a few seconds.
The observer suggested that the sighting was probably a meteor.
The report mentioned that the observer had seen many shooting stars during fifteen years of flying, suggesting experience in identifying celestial phenomena.
The flight path of the object was described as straight and parallel to the Earth.
sighted object: small bright white oval UFO that disintegrated into red fragments
